description: Cabot Provincial Park offers a short hike through some dense evergreens to numerous look off on top of the sandstone cliffs.  In many locations, you can climb down the cliffs to the sea shore and explore the outcrops of sandstone on the shore.  A magnificent beach which is sometimes under lifeguard supervision is located on the eastern side of the park.
directions: From Kensington, Highway 20 to Malpeque, Continue straight through the village and follow the numerous signs to the Cabot Park . Park in the day use/ beach area.  The forested trail is to the west of the beach.
title: Cabot Provincial Park
